abstract: Henry T. Nicholas III, the flamboyant co-founder of Broadcom charged with both illegal stock-options backdating and drug possession and distribution, pleaded not guilty to all 25 counts on Monday.
lead_paragraph: Henry T. Nicholas III, the flamboyant co-founder of Broadcom charged with both illegal stock-options backdating and drug possession and distribution, pleaded not guilty to all 25 counts on Monday.
